title: [DONOR] Pay Day 2 Pirate Perfection BLT Edition (1.1.3)
description:
This is the very mod menu/trainer given by the boys at PiratePerfection. But with a better troll menu.

This is the $5 donor version.

Installation:

1. Open file in 7zip or winrar

2. open folder C:Program Files (x86)steamsteamappscommonpayday2

3. Drag and drop files into that folder

4. replace anything it asks you to and voila.

Start up payday2 and it should work. You'll notice when it does

Here is the link to the donor version's list of stuff it comes with in case you didn't know and/or plan to support PiratePerfection:
 
https://www.pirateperfection.com/files/file/1178-pirateperfection-reborn-pro-blt-edition/
